quotes.message: You have to learn how to stay in a good mood as you overthrow the sour, puckered hallucination that is mistakenly referred to as reality.
quotes.name: Rob Brezsny

quotes.message: Good moods're as fragile as eggs. Bad moods're as fragile as bricks.
quotes.name: David Mitchell

quotes.message: If we are in a good mood when we get up in the morning, if there is a warm-hearted feeling within, automatically our inner door is opened for that day.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Lay aside life-harming heaviness and entertain a cheerful disposition
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: I credit my youthfulness at eighty to the fact of a cheerful disposition and contentment in every period of my life with what I was.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.message: There are some characters who carry their wealth with them, who are rich without money. They do not need palatial homes or a large bank account. They do not need to buy admission to society--everybody loves them. They are welcome everywhere because they have that which money cannot buy--a genial, helpful, sunny, cheerful disposition.
quotes.name: Nixon Waterman

quotes.message: You are welcome, therefore, Stranger, to join our cofraternity. But please observe the rules. Always display a cheerful disposition. Do not refer to our infirmities. Help us conquer the galaxy.
quotes.name: Thomas M. Disch

quotes.message: A cheerful disposition is good for your health; gloom and doom leave you bone-tired
quotes.name: Proverbs 17:22, The Bible

quotes.message: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: Everyone is in such a good mood when they've eaten well.
quotes.name: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.message: Well-meaning, helpful, good-natured attitudes of mind have not come to be honored on account of their usefulness, but because they are states of richer souls that are capable of bestowing and have their value in the feeling of the plenitude of life.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: The most important decision you make is to be in a good mood.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Smile, and the world will smile with you. Laugh and they'll all think your on drugs.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: The thing with pretending you're in a good mood is that sometimes you can.
quotes.name: Charles De Lint

quotes.message: When life is stressful, do something to lift your spirits. Go for a drive. Go two or three thousand miles away. Maybe change your name.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: When you're in a good mood, bring up the past. When you're in a bad mood, stick to the present. And when you're not feeling emotional at all, it's time to talk about the future.
quotes.name: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.message: Our happiness or our unhappiness depends far more on the way we meet the events of life than on the nature of those events themselves.
quotes.name: Wilhelm Von Humboldt

quotes.message: Be happy in the moment, that's enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: People in good moods are better at inductive reasoning and creative problem solving.
quotes.name: Peter Salovey

quotes.message: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: Love and focus keep you in a good mood. Forever on my mind.
quotes.name: Cam Boogie

quotes.message: I'm gonna put on my new shoes tonight I'm going to put on my good suit tonight, yeah I'm going to be in a good mood tonight 'cause the reggae music
quotes.name: Jamaram

quotes.message: I don't ever wanna quit 'Cause I never ever feel like shit Be another just to get food Force myself into a good mood
quotes.name: Henoheno

quotes.message: of feeling good I got the key to your good mood So come on you participate it's now the time to celebrate Par par party check up this beat Now boys
quotes.name: Jovanotti

quotes.message: Then, after thousands of years If I'm in a good mood I'll let you crawl out Crawl out from your cave
quotes.name: Dengue Fever

quotes.message: pair A Fendi bag and a bad attitude That's all I need to get me in a good mood She can walk with her switch and talk with street slang
quotes.name: LL Cool J

quotes.message: in a good mood You know a man's home is his castle And I'm comin' home to groove
quotes.name: Lou Rawls

quotes.message: like movie stars, set to flip The whole crowd's in a good groove, eatin the good food Soul food to keep you in a good mood
quotes.name: Heavy D & the Boyz

quotes.message: I hit the floor suggest we move our feet. Good mood is painted on our fleeting best.
quotes.name: Phil Keaggy

quotes.message: When I'm outside in a real good mood You could almost forget bout all the other things Like a big old ominous cloud in my periphery Don't wanna talk about it Simultaneous I shout it
quotes.name: Kurt Vile

quotes.message: You're always peeking at the ladies with the Short dresses on you only want me in mine when We're alone I'm going out tonight I'm in a real Good Mood I need a change of space and a fresh Attitude I'm tired now I can't take it nomore
quotes.name: Shirley Murdock

quotes.message: So please don't feel blue - let us show you how To talk yourself into a good mood right now Feeling sad is no longer allowed No matter how worthless you are
quotes.name: The Divine Comedy

quotes.message: Hit the surf, it'll put me in a good mood If I - If I believe I can achieve Gotta be the best version of me that I can be So remember, when your thoughts are wild
quotes.name: Lee Fields

quotes.message: of circus city lights The surface smiling For all the good moods you can buy I know more shadows than people We call the night as our witness
quotes.name: Fetish Fetish
